reason: The agent initially clicks the "More options" button, which leads to the "Help" menu. It then attempts to navigate back and scroll down, but fails to find the settings within the Messages app. It then opens the system settings and navigates to "Notifications" and "App settings," attempting to find the messaging app in the list. The agent is trying to find the help and feedback section, but it is going through a lot of unnecessary steps. The first screenshot shows the agent is on the home screen. The second screenshot shows the agent is in the "Help & feedback" section. The agent is able to access the help and feedback section in the second screenshot.
